headline: 5 P&C Insurance Stocks to Watch Amid Increased Digitalization
summary: Zacks Property and Casualty Insurance players like BRK.B, PGR, CB, TRV and ALL are likely to benefit from digitalization and catastrophes that drive policy renewal rate and pricing.

headline: AM Best Removes From Under Review With Developing Implications and Affirms Credit Ratings of Direct General Life Insurance Company
summary: OLDWICK, N.J., July 24, 2025--AM Best has removed from under review with developing implications and affirmed the Financial Strength Rating of A (Excellent) and the Long-Term Issuer Credit Rating of "a+" (Excellent) of Direct General Life Insurance Company (Direct General) (Orangeburg, SC). The outlook assigned to these Credit Ratings (ratings) is stable.
